Tak Terbukti Pengedar, Pria yang Viral 'Dijebak' Polisi Dilepaskan
07 Nov 2019, 15:35 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Seorang pria berinisial AG ditangkap polisi atas tuduhan sebagai pengedar narkoba. Namun, berdasarkan hasil pemeriksaan, AG terbukti bukan seorang pengedar. Video penangkapan AG ini sempat viral di media sosial dan AG disebut dijebak polisi dalam kejadian itu.
Kapolsek Kalideres Kompol Khoiri menjelaskan penangkapan yang dilakukan oleh tim narkoba di bawah pimpinan Iptu Eko Kuswanto pada Selasa (5/11) pukul 19.30 WIB itu. Awalnya, polisi menangkap pelaku berinisial U di Ruko Palm Mutiara, Cengkareng Barat, dengan barang bukti 2 paket sabu.
"Selanjutnya, pada hari yang sama jam 23.00 WIB, tim melakukan pengembangan ke pelaku P, yang berhasil ditangkap di Ruko Mutiara. Setelah diinterogasi, P mengaku barang itu didapat dari bandar di lapas di Tangerang melalui tangan seorang kurir," jelas Kompol Khoiri dalam keterangannya, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Dari hasil penyelidikan, didapat informasi bahwa bandar di lapas ini mengantarkan narkoba kepada P lewat seorang kurir. Kurir itulah yang menentukan tempat transaksi.
"Selanjutnya, sekitar pukul 22.30 WIB, kurir telepon ke P bahwa barang pesanan (sabu) sudah diletakkan oleh kurir di tiang rantai di halaman toko H Marmo (di dalam bungkus rokok), di lokasi yang viral itu," jelasnya.
Selanjutnya tim menuju ke lokasi. Sesampai di lokasi, tim menemukan seseorang--yang belakangan diketahui berinisial AG--sedang nongkrong sambil memegang ponsel.
"Keberadaan AG di tempat tersebut (depan toko) beralasan sedang men-download film menggunakan Wi-Fi gratis milik toko H Marmo," katanya.
Karena curiga terhadap aktivitas AG, tim selanjutnya mengamankan AG. Menurutnya, saat itu polisi meminta AG mengambil barang itu di tiang yang dimaksud oleh kurir.
"Selanjutnya yang bersangkutan kami bawa ke Polsek dan kami interogasi. Setelah dilakukan pemeriksaan dan penelusuran, ternyata AG bukanlah kurir yang menaruh barang di lokasi tersebut," tuturnya.

Unproven dealers, Viral Men 'Trapped' Police Released
Nov 7 2019, 15:35 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - A man with the initials AG was arrested by the police on charges of being a drug dealer. However, based on the results of the examination, AG proved to be not a dealer. The video of AG's arrest was viral on social media and AG was called to be trapped by the police in the incident.
Kalideres Police Chief Commissioner Khoiri explained the arrests made by the drug team under the leadership of Iptu Eko Kuswanto on Tuesday (5/11) at 19.30 WIB. Initially, the police arrested the perpetrators with the initial U at Ruko Mutiara Mutiara, West Cengkareng, with two pieces of methamphetamine evidence.
"Furthermore, on the same day at 23.00 West Indonesia Time, the team developed the perpetrators of P, who were captured at Ruko Mutiara. After being interrogated, P claimed that the goods were obtained from the airport in prison in Tangerang through the hands of a courier," Kompol Khoiri explained in his statement. , Thursday (7/11/2019).
From the results of the investigation, information was obtained that the dealer in this prison was delivering drugs to P via a courier. The courier determines the place of the transaction.
"Next, around 22.30 West Indonesia Time, the courier telephone to P that the ordered goods (methamphetamine) had been placed by the courier on the chain pole in the H Marmo store yard (in a cigarette pack), at the viral location," he explained.
Next the team headed to the location. Arriving at the location, the team found someone - later known to have the initials AG - hanging out while holding a cellphone.
"The existence of AG in that place (in front of the store) is reasonable because it is downloading movies using the free Wi-Fi owned by the shop H Marmo," he said.
Because they were suspicious of AG's activities, the team then secured AG. According to him, at that time the police asked the AG to take the item at the pole intended by the courier.
"Furthermore, we brought the relevant police to the police station and we were interrogated. After checking and tracing, it turned out that AG was not the courier who placed the goods at the location," he said.
